alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 1:28AM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow mixing with rain. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Turnagain Pass south through Summit Lake. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels may climb as high as 1500 ft. Rain on snow will create hazardous travel conditions. Colder air will move back in Sunday, returning light snow to the area.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
